title: Intel announces NUC 12 Extreme with 12th-generation desktop processors and a modular design
content:
Intel has announced the latest family in its NUC (next unit of computing) series, the NUC 12 Extreme, codenamed Dragon Canyon. If you’re not familiar with the NUC series, this is essentially a barebones small form factor desktop PC with a modular design. It gives you the core components of a computer, but it doesn’t

The post Intel announces NUC 12 Extreme with 12th-generation desktop processors and a modular design appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Intel has announced the latest in its series of NUC barebones computers, the NUC 12 Extreme, now with up to a 12th-generation Core i9.
